description: Visit Western Riverside Waste Authority, Smugglers Way Waste Transfer Station during the Open House Festival to find out what happens to waste and recycling from Hammersmith & Fulham, Kensington and Chelsea, Wandsworth and Lambeth.

factsheet.heading: Tour Details
paragraphs: You can visit us –  See the waste transfer station in action.
“We were all mightily impressed by both the tour and the immense facility you have.”
Residents' tours are for aged over 18 yrs only.  Under 18's from our member boroughs are able to visit with their school. Please see our website for details.

factsheet.heading: WHAT DOES THE TOUR ENTAIL?
paragraphs: The tour will last around 1.5 hours inc Q&A’s and will involve at least 45 mins of walking/standing.
– We recommend attendees wear thick soled shoes (not sandals or thin soled trainers ) as there may be broken glass on the walkways.
– Visitors must stay close to the Education Officer at all times.
